# exposureMode

**Instance Property**

The exposure mode for the device.

## Declaration

```swift
var exposureMode: AVCaptureDevice.ExposureMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

Before changing the value of this property, you must call [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/lockForConfiguration()] to acquire exclusive access to the device’s configuration properties. Otherwise, setting the value of this property raises an exception. When you’re done configuring the device, call [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/unlockForConfiguration()] to release the lock and allow other devices to configure the settings.

This property is key-value observable.

## Managing the exposure mode

- **isExposureModeSupported(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a device supports the specified exposure mode.
- **AVCaptureDevice.ExposureMode**: Constants that specify the exposure mode of a capture device.
